workflow.name: LinkedIn content machine: Email-approved posts with Gemini AI
workflow.description:
Turn a simple email workflow into a **LinkedIn content machine**. Generate post ideas, draft full posts, and auto-publish to LinkedIn all controlled by replying to emails.  

---

## üìå Purpose  
Automate your LinkedIn posting pipeline using **AI + Email approvals**.  
- Generate **10 scroll-stopping post ideas** tailored to your niche & audience.  
- Approve your favorite by replying to the email with a number.  
- Receive **3 AI-written drafts** for the chosen idea.  
- Pick your favorite draft via email reply.  
- The selected post gets **auto-published to LinkedIn** ‚úÖ.  
- All steps are logged in **Google Sheets**.  

---

## üîó Apps Used  
- **Google Gemini** ‚Üí generates ideas & drafts  
- **Gmail** ‚Üí email-based approval workflow  
- **Google Sheets** ‚Üí tracks ideas, drafts, and published posts  
- **LinkedIn API** ‚Üí posts directly to your company or personal account  

---

## ‚ú® Highlights  
- üì¨ Email-based approval ‚Üí no dashboards, just reply with a number  
- üìù 10 AI-generated content ideas + 3 full drafts per topic  
- üîÑ End-to-end tracking in Google Sheets (`ideas ‚Üí drafts ‚Üí published`)  
- ‚ö° Auto-posting directly to LinkedIn  
- ‚úÖ Final confirmation email with preview  

---

## üë§ Best For  
- Startup founders  
- Agencies managing multiple clients‚Äô LinkedIn  
- Solopreneurs & creators who want consistent posting  

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Workflow Overview  

```mermaid

flowchart TB
    A["Manual Trigger"] --> B["AI Agent - Generate 10 Ideas"]
    B --> C["Code - Parse JSON + Correlation ID"]
    C --> D["Google Sheets - Append Ideas"]
    D --> E["Gmail - Send Ideas Email"]
    E --> F["Gmail Trigger - Await Reply"]
    F --> G["Code1 - Extract Reply Number"]
    G --> H["Google Sheets - Fetch Row"]
    H --> I{"Switch Stage"}
    I -- Ideas --> J["AI Agent - Generate 3 Drafts"]
    J --> K["Code3 - Parse Drafts"]
    K --> L["Google Sheets - Update Drafts"]
    L --> M["Gmail - Send Drafts Email"]
    I -- Drafts --> N["Code4 - Select Final Draft"]
    N --> O["LinkedIn - Publish Post"]
    O --> P["Google Sheets - Update Posted"]
    P --> Q["Gmail - Send Confirmation"]
```

workflow.name: Generate and post Content on Linkedin using AI Agent with Gemini Chat API

parameters.content:
Turn a simple email workflow into a **LinkedIn content machine**. Generate post ideas, draft full posts, and auto-publish to LinkedIn ‚Äî all controlled by replying to emails.  

---

## üìå Purpose  
Automate your LinkedIn posting pipeline using **AI + Email approvals**.  
- Generate **10 scroll-stopping post ideas** tailored to your niche & audience.  
- Approve your favorite by replying to the email with a number.  
- Receive **3 AI-written drafts** for the chosen idea.  
- Pick your favorite draft via email reply.  
- The selected post gets **auto-published to LinkedIn** ‚úÖ.  
- All steps are logged in **Google Sheets**.  

---

## üîó Apps Used  
- **Google Gemini** ‚Üí generates ideas & drafts  
- **Gmail** ‚Üí email-based approval workflow  
- **Google Sheets** ‚Üí tracks ideas, drafts, and published posts  
- **LinkedIn API** ‚Üí posts directly to your company or personal account  

---

## ‚ú® Highlights  
- üì¨ Email-based approval ‚Üí no dashboards, just reply with a number  
- üìù 10 AI-generated content ideas + 3 full drafts per topic  
- üîÑ End-to-end tracking in Google Sheets (`ideas ‚Üí drafts ‚Üí published`)  
- ‚ö° Auto-posting directly to LinkedIn  
- ‚úÖ Final confirmation email with preview  

---

## üë§ Best For  
- Startup founders  
- Agencies managing multiple clients‚Äô LinkedIn  
- Solopreneurs & creators who want consistent posting  

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Workflow Overview  

```mermaid
flowchart TD
    A[Manual Trigger] --> B[AI Agent - Generate 10 Ideas]
    B --> C[Code - Parse JSON + Correlation ID]
    C --> D[Google Sheets - Append Ideas]
    D --> E[Gmail - Send Ideas Email]
    E --> F[Gmail Trigger - Await Reply]
    F --> G[Code1 - Extract Reply Number]
    G --> H[Google Sheets - Fetch Row]
    H --> I{Switch Stage}
    I -->|Ideas| J[AI Agent - Generate 3 Drafts]
    J --> K[Code3 - Parse Drafts]
    K --> L[Google Sheets - Update Drafts]
    L --> M[Gmail - Send Drafts Email]
    I -->|Drafts| N[Code4 - Select Final Draft]
    N --> O[LinkedIn - Publish Post]
    O --> P[Google Sheets - Update Posted]
    P --> Q[Gmail - Send Confirmation]

### 1. Manual Trigger  
Runs workflow manually for testing or ad-hoc posting.

### 2. Edit Fields (Set Node)  
Defines **niche** & **audience** for content generation.

### 3. AI Agent (LangChain Agent)  
Generates **10 post ideas** in strict JSON format.

### 4. Google Gemini Chat Model  
LLM backend for AI Agent. Requires Gemini API credentials.

### 5. Code (Parse AI Output)  
Cleans JSON, generates correlationId, builds email body.

### 6. Append Row in Sheet (Google Sheets)  
Logs generated ideas, stage set to *ideas*.

### 7. Send a Message (Gmail)  
Emails you the ideas. You reply with a number.

### 8. Gmail Trigger  
Listens for replies with `[CID: ...]`.

### 9. Code1 (Extract Reply)  
Parses reply to extract chosen number & correlationId.

### 10. Get Row(s) in Sheet  
Fetches stored row by correlationId.

### 11. Switch  
Routes flow: **ideas ‚Üí drafts ‚Üí publish**.

### 12. Code2 (Match Selected Idea)  
Finds the chosen idea & extracts topic.

### 13. AI Agent1 (Draft Generator)  
Generates **3 drafts** (120‚Äì200 words each).

### 14. Google Gemini Chat Model1  
Backend for AI Agent1.

### 15. Code3 (Parse Drafts)  
Parses drafts JSON, builds email body.

### 16. Update Row in Sheet  
Updates stage to *drafts*, logs drafts JSON.

### 17. Send a Message1 (Gmail)  
Emails you the 3 drafts for approval.

### 18. Code4 (Match Selected Draft)  
Extracts final draft based on reply number.

### 19. Create a Post (LinkedIn)  
Publishes final post to LinkedIn.

### 20. Update Row in Sheet1  
Updates sheet stage to *Posted* with LinkedIn URN.

### 21. Send a Message2 (Gmail)  
Sends final confirmation email with preview.

user.name: Parag Javale
user.bio: Tech driven creative who turns ideas into impact. I blend storytelling, product strategy, and automation whether it‚Äôs hooky audio promos, smart LMS platforms, or AI driven workflows. I help businesses grab attention, streamline ops, and scale fast. Big on data, experiments, and building digital solutions that actually work.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.
